page.title: 06Cliff Rigg Quarry.
page.content: {Cliff Rigg Quarry}is a rough and rugged crack in the landscape overlooked by Roseberry Topping.Part of Cliff Rigg Quarry is known as the Elephant Hole as it is so big .To reach it from Roseberry School walk up Roseberry Crescent until you reach the Public footpath.Follow across the fields ,past the railway bridge and you will soon see Cliff Rigg Quarry. Geologists often take samples from the Quarry .There are two main kinds of stone {Sandstone}and{Whinstone.}People also search for{fossils.}The sides of the Quarry are mainly scree.Although it is rather dangerous in the Quarry,there is an abundance of plant life crawling the flimsy walls,which crumble more after every hard winter. In June nature is in full bloom wild flowers,mosses and grasses grow and it is covered in gorse .
